Description:
Detects the creation of a suspicious ADS (Alternate Data Stream) file by software other than browsers

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Creation Of a Suspicious ADS File Outside a Browser Download
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((contents like '[ZoneTransfer]  ZoneId=3%' and filepath like '%:Zone.Identifier' and (filepath like '%.exe%' or filepath like '%.scr%' or filepath like '%.bat%' or filepath like '%.cmd%' or filepath like '%.docx%' or filepath like '%.hta%' or filepath like '%.jse%' or filepath like '%.lnk%' or filepath like '%.pptx%' or filepath like '%.ps%' or filepath like '%.reg%' or filepath like '%.sct%' or filepath like '%.vb%' or filepath like '%.wsc%' or filepath like '%.wsf%' or filepath like '%.xlsx%')) and  not (process_path like '%\opera.exe' or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe') or process_path like '%\vivaldi.exe' or process_path like '%\maxthon.exe' or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\EdgeCore\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft\EdgeCore\%') and (process_path like '%\msedge.exe' or process_path like '%\msedgewebview2.exe')) or process_path like '%\seamonkey.exe' or (process_path like 'C:\Program Files\WindowsApps\Microsoft.ScreenSketch_%' and process_path like '%\SnippingTool\SnippingTool.exe' and filepath like 'C:\Users\%' and (filepath like '%\AppData\Local\Packages\Microsoft.ScreenSketch_%' and filepath like '%\TempState\Screenshot %') and filepath like '%.png:Zone.Identifier') or (process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\EdgeWebView\Application\%' and process_path like '%\WindowsApps\MicrosoftEdge.exe' and (process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe')) or process_path like '%\brave.exe' or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe') or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe') or process_path like '%\safari.exe' or process_path like '%\whale.exe'))
